#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 17:12:18

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    min_x = xs[0]
    max_x = xs[-1]
    if x < min_x:
        max_x = max_x + (min_x - x)
    elif x > max_x:
        min_x = min_x - (x - max_x)
    return max_x - min_x

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


n, k = list(map(int, input().split()))
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()

ans = 0

print(ans)

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:36

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    x_min = xs[0]
    x_max = xs[-1]
    if x < x_min:
        x_max += (x_min - x)
    elif x > x_max:
        x_min -= (x - x_max)
    return x_max - x_min

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

N, X = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
x.sort()
dist = []
for i in range(N):
    dist.append(abs(X - x[i]))
dist.sort()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, N - 1):
    ans = max(ans, (dist[i] - dist[i - 1]) // 2)
print(ans)

a = input()
b = input()
print(a)
print(b)


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong
# @Email: liangshuailong@gmail.com
# @Date: 2019-05-14 16:49:37
# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 16:52:31

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs.sort()
    xmin = xs[0]
    xmax = xs[-1]
    if x < xmin:
        xmax = xmax + (xmin - x)
    elif x > xmax:
        xmin = xmin - (x - xmax)
    return xmax - xmin

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# @Author: Shuailong

# @Last Modified by: Shuailong
# @Last Modified time: 2019-05-14 17:08:54

import sys

def solve(x, xs):
    xs = sorted(xs)
    min_x = xs[0]
    max_x = xs[-1]
    if x < min_x:
        max_x = max_x + (min_x - x)
    elif x > max_x:
        min_x = min_x - (x - max_x)
    return max_x - min_x

def main():
    n, x = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    xs = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
    print(solve(x, xs))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
